p: The expression profiles of all the DEGs adhered to two response patterns ( Figure 5A,B). Seven significant expression clusters were observed in all the DEGs under darkness treatment followed by recovery light. The DEGs in cluster 5 were upregulated under darkness and downregulated after recovery (4736 genes), and those in cluster 2 were downregulated under darkness and upregulated under light exposure (3399 genes) ( Figure 5C).
